title: ‘It’s Not Like We Disappeared’: Ben Swift Insists Ineos Grenadiers Still at Top of Peloton
content:
Veteran rider says UK super team isn't resting on laurels: 'We are still there, we are still challenging. We want to win the Tour de France.'

Read the full article at ‘It’s Not Like We Disappeared’: Ben Swift Insists Ineos Grenadiers Still at Top of Peloton on Velo.
author: ahood
